trends: There have been no other sightings in Dobson
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
divs: Sighting DetailsWe where driving home when I noticed a strange looking object in the sky,I told my fiancee to look and he said oh it is probably fighter jets to which I said they are sitting still in the sky and one looked liked a disc shaped and the other two looked long and bright but not moving, when he looked at them he yelled stop the car and that is what I did. We tried to take a picture with our camera phone but it would not show up,I pointed to the disc shape one and told him to try and get it, at that point that thing took off like nothing I have ever seen,it was there and then gone in an instant!!We continued to watch and then more showed up,we counted at least twelve, all following formation really really close to one another. We heard no sound coming from them and they where all headed south west.I finally got a little afraid and told my fiancee we where leaving the area. I have seen things in the past and regreted not telling someone, so I have tried to tell you everything that I could.
Summary: The leader was disc shaped and the rest was shaped like long bight cigar shaped. They appeared to be in 3 squards.
